name: Shikae
description: A sweet drink made from barley malt powder, sugar, rice, and sometimes pine nuts.

name: Ginseng tea
description: A warm and comforting drink that some Koreans drink to boost their energy levels, immune system, and heart health.

name: Omija tea
description: A bright pink beverage made from a mysterious fruit found in the peninsula's mountain valleys.

name: Citron tea
description: An herbal tea made from the citron fruit that has been part of Korean tradition for over 100 years.
